line.text: How careful was I when I took my way
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Each trifle under truest bars to thrust
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That to my use it might unused stay
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: From hands of falsehood in sure wards of trust
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But thou to whom my jewels trifles are
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Most worthy comfort now my greatest grief
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thou best of dearest and mine only care
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Art left the prey of every vulgar thief
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thee have I not locked up in any chest
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Save where thou art not though I feel thou art
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Within the gentle closure of my breast
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: From whence at pleasure thou mayst come and part
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And even thence thou wilt be stoln I fear
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For truth proves thievish for a prize so dear
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
